org.vaadin.artur.griddesign.client.escalator

Interface EscalatorUpdater


  • public interface EscalatorUpdater

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean updateCells(Row row, List<Cell> cellsToUpdate)
      Called whenever one or several cells in a row needs to be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • updateCells

        boolean updateCells(Row row,
                  List<Cell> cellsToUpdate)
        Called whenever one or several cells in a row needs to be updated.
        Parameters:
        row - Information about the row to update
        cellsToUpdate - A collection of cells which need to be updated
        Returns:
        true if the updater is ready to render the cell contents, false to delay rendering until later
